user_query: I'm a beer connoisseur and I'm planning a road trip across the United States to explore different breweries. Can you provide me with a list of breweries in each state that have dog-friendly facilities? Additionally, I would like to know the win rate of jockeys in the last 7 days to make informed bets on horse races along the way.

TaskList.description: Gather a comprehensive list of breweries across all US states that have dog-friendly facilities.
Extract the win rate of jockeys from horse races in the last 7 days.
Compile the information from subtasks 1 and 2 and create a combined travel itinerary for the road trip.
